title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V1p1beta1\SpeechAdaptationInfo
name: SpeechAdaptationInfo
description:
Information on speech adaptation use in results

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v1p1beta1.SpeechAdaptationInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.adaptation_timeout
params.description: Whether there was a timeout when applying speech adaptation. If true, adaptation had no effect in the response transcript.

params.name: data.timeout_message
params.description: If set, returns a message specifying which part of the speech adaptation request timed out.
